alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:51AM CDT until May 07 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 551 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bartlett, or 24 miles southwest of Neligh, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wheeler County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
